data.meta_description: Learn about area code 503 and starting a business in Portland in United States. Get a local phone number 503 area code with Textr Team for free!
data.text:
What Area Code is 503?

Portland is an effervescent city located in the Pacific Northwest of the United States. Its area codes are 503 and 971, covering approximately two million people.

These codes cover several of the surrounding cities and neighborhoods, including Beaverton, Gresham, Hillsboro, and Vancouver.

Why Start a Business in Portland?

Portland is an economic hub in the United States, with an unemployment rate of 4.1%, one of the lowest among major cities in the US.

Demographic:

Portland is the most populous city in Oregon, with a population of 641,162 according to the 2021 US Census. The city has a population consisting of 77.4% White, 8.7% Asian, and 6.2% African American residents.

Businesses:

Portland boasts a wide range of small businesses and entrepreneurs across many different sectors. From brick-and-mortar stores like Porch Light and Bull in China to online startups such as ShopIgniter, to the abundant successful food carts such as Baon Kainan, Bing Mi, and Kim Jong Grillin.

Entrepreneurship:

Businesses in the food and beverage industry, as well as retail stores, are among the most popular in Portland. The city is a great place for entrepreneurs to start their businesses due to its low taxes. Furthermore, Portland offers an array of resources and support networks to help small business owners grow.

Ready to grow your business in Portland? Start your free 7-day trial with Textr Team. You can start calling and texting from your local 503area code number for free immediately with no setup cost.

SMS Campaign

Streamline your bulk messaging process with a pay-as-you-go system that is compliant with the Campaign Registry. Our technology makes it faster and easier for you to generate leads. Unleash the potential of your business and witness its growth accelerate faster than ever before!

Ring All Users

Ring All Users is an advanced feature offered by Textr Team app. It allows all incoming calls to a particular group of numbers to be directed to a single extension or a few different devices. This can be incredibly helpful for customer services or business reception, especially when the office is short handed due to any reason.
